name: CleverError – Make your error pages more clever
author: TomPod

sections.description:
Rather than losing a visitor when they mistype a URL, follow an old link or end up where they shouldn’t you provide them with an easy and elegant way to find their way back to your site and content.

If you wish to learn a bit more about CleverError – check out http://clevererror.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload clevererror-folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can do further customizations in the CleverError-menu
sections.changelog:
0.20

  • Dutch language on errorpages added, thanks ritchietomasouw!

0.15

  • German language on errorpages added, you can select this language in the options section.

0.1

  • Initial release

short_description: CleverError intelligently replace your old 404 'Page Not Found'-page with a supercharged version with an internal site search.
